New Records: James Harden moved into second place on the NBA's career 3-point list, passing Ray Allen with No. 2,874
Key Match Events: The Clippers led 66-45 at halftime and weathered a late run when the Jazz pulled within seven points with 3:18 remaining
Post-Match Reflections: The Clippers ended a three-game losing streak and have a four-game winning streak in the new Intuit Dome
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mo Bamba made his Clippers debut after opening the season with a left knee soreness
The Clippers host Golden State on Monday night
Others: The Jazz are 0-2 on a four-game trip
The Clippers won their fourth consecutive game in the new Intuit Dome
